net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_adornActionTypes
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Arg(0) - Action to rebuild, which is normally an Array of RollExpressions
For each RollExpression this will evaluate the corresponding ExpressionType an instantiate the respective prototype. The Types of that prototype will be copied onto the original RollExpression
Returns - An Array of REs, adorned with their expected Types
